ComicInfo.Summary:
The machinations of the Red Death have scattered the masked heroes of three eras into the time stream. Now, wildly altered versions of the heroes have reunited for one last campaign to defeat the and save all of reality.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A/Reg | Regular Cover | Butch Guice & Alex Guimaraes | 1 | B/Var | Variant Cover | Jae Lee & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C/Sub | Subscription Cover | Gabriel Hardman & Jordan Boyd | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Colton Worley | 4 | E/RI | 1:15 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Butch Guice | 5 | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Jae Lee | 6 | G/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Gabriel Hardman | 7 | H/LE | Rare "Virgin Art" Edition Cover, Limited to 50 | Jae Lee & Ivan Nunes | 8 | I/LE | Rare "Virgin Art" Edition Cover, Limited to 50 | Gabriel Hardman & Jordan Boyd | 9 |
